Newbie Helper:
Welcome. I want to give you one assignment. Have you met the Gremlins in the neighborhood? These bastards stole the precious Blue Gem and escaped.
Your job is to find him. To return the gem, you need to hunt gremlins.
Hover over Gremlin and click left button. The cursor will take the form of a sword. With the cursor changed, click again with the left button and attack.
When you're done with this, I'll give you something useful as a gift. So, good luck.
